phrases: That girl, Hatori Chise, is officially dead in Japan.
So I chose a location here and plugged her in.
No, I am glad you told me.
The ones with potential and ambition are treasures, are not they?
I do not want to drink with you!
It is a Christmas gift from Alice.
Could not you come in here more quietly?
Do not mind if I do.
I never said you could touch that.
You still have not fixed that arm of yours?
Have you had contact with him since?
A sorcerer that is been wandering for centuries, huh?
Eternal life is a timeless theme.
Brilliant, but you will make enemies being like that.
I do not need more than a few people on my side.
If I were brilliant, I would not have let myself be threatened by him.
That is going to go on for another four hours, at least.
What is this, it is not just Adolf?
He is my former master's familiar.
Weird, I do not feel groggy.
I am neither warm nor cold.
Miss, I can see through you.
You need to go where you belong.
Otherwise, it is just not right, is it?
I do not have such a cursed name!
What do we need to do to be saved?
Who would you go to see?
I cannot get his voice out of my ears.
How many days has it been now?
You have only been sleeping for two days.
So, why is Lindel-san's Selkie here?
I will go let everyone know.
We have got a nasty situation...
Can I just pick out any outfit for you?
By the way, Alice, how old are you?
I have never been able to get a good look at a living Sleigh Beggy!
I am so glad I got to meet you.
I hate to admit that he is my colleague, but sorry about my colleague.
Sorry about my disrespectful behavior last time.
You can cut the small talk.
As we have already explained to him,
dragon hatchlings were poached from the land of dragons.
It is a transportation device I made.
Cartaphilus is likely behind this incident.
He seems to have stolen the know-how behind the device when he took my arm.
I understand well that you did not mean for this to happen.
The question is why we need to join you in finding Cartaphilus and the dragons.
You have a friendship with the land of dragons, and you are familiar with Cartaphilus.
Why is the college in the business of looking for dragons, anyway?
Lindel-sama and the college have an agreement.
Could you help us to bring the dragons back to Lindelto your friend?
He is bound to that land.
This is for his sake, too.
This is not our business, and it is dangerous.
Have you forgotten how fragile your body is?
I think you have forgotten, too, Elias.
It was also extremely painful and agonizing,
You are right, we are neither obliged nor responsible.
But unlike us, the dragons left the land of dragons against their will.
I do not want those kids I played with
So, do we have any leads or ideas?
None on where Cartaphilus might be.
We have Lindel maintaining contact with the dragons, but things are not very clear,
possibly because they are not fully conscious.
I think Cartaphilus is in London.
Stroud-san, do dragons sell for a lot of money?
Sorry, can someone lend me a phone?
I am in Paris right now.
Depending on price and terms, I may take on your work.
I believe magic and sorcery are not allowed at the auction.
That is what I heard, so I am using neither magic nor sorcery.
I just reassembled the whole thing.
It is neither me nor Simon.
I will choose not to hear all your names.
Um, if it is possible, I would like to contribute this.
We will make this the first item of the afternoon.
And then we will move on to the main auction.
The dragon auction begins at 6 PM.
Until then, feel free to do as you please.
You sure do sell whatever you want here.
Half of the value of your sale price is deposited there.
You were both a product as well as an exhibitor,
Please use that if the college's funding is inadequate.
Come to think of it, this money really belongs to Elias.
You have a different aura about you.
You are different from when we last met.
I have changed in some ways, and stayed the same in others.
The most important parts of a person seldom change.
You are stubborn after all, for better or worse.
Hey, want to come to the college?
There is someone at home who gets lonely when I am not there.
Glad to see you are not easy.
If there is something you want to say, say it out loud.
You have not told her about the college, have you?
She is not going to the college.
So there is no reason to tell her.
What did you do with the messenger?
It is unlike you to be so fixated on a Sleigh Beggy, Renfred.
It is not that I am worried about a Sleigh Beggy.
I am worried about the future of a human being.
but how far is she going to grow if she is forced to be dependent on you?
Is that for us to discuss?
We find someone without direction, burden them with a chest full of knowledge,
and force them onto a ship that takes them into the future.
We act as if we have shown them a path, and make them believe it is the only path.
The two of us are not very different, are we?
You never wanted to be a sorcerer, did you?
Do not you dare choose my path for me.
It will be interesting to see how long that lasts.
Living creatures change, whether they desire it or not.
That pile of bones does not get it, though.
There is a ton of people who can only tread their own path,
even when they are shown rails to follow.
Do you tread your own path?
The paths form where I choose to tread.
It is nice to be young.
We hereby begin the six of the clock auction.
The northern land of dragons is sealed off.
It was there that this purebred, winged dragon was raised!
The college can manage up to 1.5 million.
Or a proxy for a proxy.
As high as you know my balance goes.
No one else can hear me.
A woman that you could make use of.
Please do it if we are at our limit.
It is too bad this is only a verbal agreement.
Please do not go home with any regrets.
Damn it, that was reinforced with a specialized spell.
We have never had this happen!
You can hear the dragon's voice?!
You do not need to let them take you.
The dragon's sorrowful howls echo through the skies of London.
The girl makes a decision to save the dragon, but it was far too brutal.
